name: Toad Tussle
description:
Fight your friends as an easily excited toad in this local multiplayer game! Just flail your body and hope it lands on someone! Or press 1, 2, 3, or 4 to fight dummies.

For those who are too lazy to download, here's a browser version:
https://seingo.itch.io/toad-tussle-webgl-asmjs?secret=akEfnKijPqVQcEhXwnKVWkfl30

NOTE: no keyboard controls, designed to be used with an Xbox controller. PS4 controller works with different controls, square is boost and R2 is join.
